backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production environment file defining the required VITE_PUBLIC_URL domain for builds.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template with metadata, canonical URL, and Open Graph/Twitter tags pointing to the production domain.
frontend/PUBLIC_URL.md: Documentation explaining the canonical public URL configuration and its role as the source of truth.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders sections based on active navigation tab and applies view‑mode layout handling.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with fixed Facebook share URL, Instagram link, branding, and dynamic year/attribution.
frontend/src/components/site/portfolio/D: Embeds a Google Drive video with loading, error, and expand-overlay states using an iframe.
frontend/src/components/site/portfolio/P: Renders a portfolio item card and opens a fullscreen video overlay for video items.
Displays a fullscreen video overlay with scroll lock, escape-to-close, and an embedded iframe player.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: Shows the About section with a photo, descriptive paragraphs, and a grid of past collaborations.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Provides contact options including email, Instagram, and location within a styled section.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Renders the hero banner with headline text and buttons for navigating to media kit or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Me: Displays media kit details including stats, demographics, platforms, services, and notable projects.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Po: Lists portfolio categories and renders each item's card using PortfolioItemCard.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Shows pricing for influencer and UGC content with items, add‑ons, and a custom note.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Provides a reusable layout wrapper for site sections with title, subtitle, and optional styling.
frontend/src/components/site/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with tab routing, scroll behavior, mobile sheet menu, and view mode selector.
frontend/src/components/site/ViewModeCon: Selector component allowing users to switch between auto, mobile, and desktop preview modes.
frontend/src/config/publicUrl.ts: Defines the app’s canonical PUBLIC_URL with optional override via environment variable.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines static site content including hero text, about info, media kit data, portfolio categories, and pricing placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance that updates when the Internet Identity changes and triggers related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, stored identity restoration, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useTabNavigation.ts: Manages tab navigation based on URL hash changes and provides helpers to switch tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewMode.ts: Stores and applies a persistent view mode (auto/mobile/desktop) via localStorage and document attributes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, utility classes, and view‑mode-specific layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/googleDrive.ts: Utility functions for extracting Google Drive file IDs and generating various embed and view URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings to CSS variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, existing features, pending requests, and metadata for deployment readiness.
